page.title: 08Old Mrs. Holmes
page.content: We interviewed an old lady called {Mrs. Holmes}who was{92}years of age.We asked her a questionaire about how {Wentworth}has changed since the war.We asked her questions on 4 different categories:-School life,Work,Wentworth House and the war.At{school}she used to write on a{slate}with a piece of {chalk.}She had to walk 2 miles to get to{school.}Her favourite lesson was {history.}The teachers where mostly men and very strict. When she left school she was a{servant.}She got{half a {crown}a week which is 12 and a half pence. We asked her if she had seen any of the Wentworth house parties, she said 'Yes,we used to go and I used to take my children at christmas'.We asked her if she thought it was posh,she said'Yes'. I think she really likes Wentworth!
